columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the network interface

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a network interface uniquely

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the network interface

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: Providsioning state of the network interface resource

columns.name: enable_accelerated_networking
columns.description: Indicates whether the network interface is accelerated networking enabled

columns.name: enable_ip_forwarding
columns.description: Indicates whether IP forwarding is enabled on this network interface

columns.name: internal_dns_name_label
columns.description: Relative DNS name for this NIC used for internal communications between VMs in the same virtual network

columns.name: internal_domain_name_suffix
columns.description: Contains domain name suffix for the network interface

columns.name: internal_fqdn
columns.description: Fully qualified DNS name supporting internal communications between VMs in the same virtual network

columns.name: is_primary
columns.description: Indicates whether this is a primary network interface on a virtual machine

columns.name: mac_address
columns.description: The MAC address of the network interface

columns.name: network_security_group_id
columns.description: The reference to the NetworkSecurityGroup resource

columns.name: resource_guid
columns.description: The resource GUID property of the network interface resource

columns.name: virtual_machine_id
columns.description: The reference to a virtual machine

columns.name: vnet_encryption_supported
columns.description: Whether the virtual machine this NIC is attached to supports encryption.

columns.name: workload_type
columns.description: Workload type of the network interface for BareMetal resources.

columns.name: nic_type
columns.description: Type of network interface resource (e.g., Standard, Elastic).

columns.name: migration_phase
columns.description: Migration phase of network interface resource.

columns.name: auxiliary_mode
columns.description: Auxiliary mode of network interface resource.

columns.name: applied_dns_servers
columns.description: A list of applied dns servers

columns.name: dns_servers
columns.description: A collection of DNS servers IP addresses

columns.name: hosted_workloads
columns.description: A collection of references to linked BareMetal resources

columns.name: ip_configurations
columns.description: A list of IPConfigurations of the network interface

columns.name: tap_configurations
columns.description: A collection of TapConfigurations of the network interface

columns.name: dscp_configuration
columns.description: A reference to the DSCP configuration to which the network interface is linked.

columns.name: private_link_service
columns.description: Private link service of the network interface resource.

columns.name: private_endpoint
columns.description: A reference to the private endpoint to which the network interface is linked.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
